greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: q=2;t(n,m,q)=If[m == 0 || m == n, 1, Binomial[n, m] - 1 + (q^ Floor[n/2])*Binomial[n - 2, m - 1]]
formula: t(n,m,q)=If[m == 0 || m == n, 1, Binomial[n, m] - 1 + (q^ Floor[n/2])*Binomial[n - 2, m - 1]]
mathematica: t[n_, m_, q_] := If[m == 0 || m == n, 1, Binomial[n, m] - 1 + (q^Floor[n/2])*Binomial[n - 2, m - 1]];
results.author: _Roger L. Bagula_, Feb 09 2010
